item.description:
Hello Madams!!
I'm so glad you all have joined the group, and I excited to meet all of you at our first meet up of the month which will be an after work meeting at the Brick Cafe where we can sit and get to know one another as well as have a drink, a coffee, or have a lovely desert. This is one of my favorite restaurant in Astoria, but they have a nice bar/sitting area where we can chat!
Now the Brick can hold small groups of up to 8-10 people per sitting, so if we have more people RSVP we may have to change the location by Wednesday to Cafe Bar which holds more people. Cafe Bar is located on 34th Ave and 36th street.
So please RSVP and let me know if you can make it.
[/url]it!
Hope to see you Friday!
Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a name tag on :) Or call me on my cell: (413) 627-3484
item.name: First Meetup of the Month @ the Brick Cafe Astoria!!
